alert.note: Alert for Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 20 at 12:27AM EDT until May 20 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Washington County in south central Indiana... * Until 100 AM EDT. * At 1227 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Bedford to 10 miles west of Salem to 6 miles east of Paoli, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Salem, Campbellsburg, Little York, Livonia, Saltillo, Kossuth, Smedley, Claysville, Hitchcock, and Prowsville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Louisville.
